function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Self-reported increase in levels of anxiety, anger, fear, and other negative emotions during quarantine.","Impact":"Negative impact on psychological health and well-being.","Mitigation":"Provide access to mental health resources, promote physical activity, and encourage social interaction.","Technologies":"Telehealth services, mental health apps, and virtual fitness programs.","People":"Participants of the study, individuals in quarantine.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of validated scales assessing perceived change in psychological indicators during quarantine.","Impact":"Inability to accurately measure the impact of quarantine on psychological health.","Mitigation":"Develop and validate scales for assessing changes in psychological indicators during quarantine.","Technologies":"Psychological assessment tools, statistical analysis software.","People":"Researchers, psychologists, mental health professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies."},{"Description":"Potential detrimental effect of quarantine on psychological health.","Impact":"Increased risk of psychological distress and mental health issues among individuals in quarantine.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, promote resilience-building activities, and monitor for signs of psychological distress.","Technologies":"Teletherapy, mental health screening tools, and remote monitoring apps.","People":"Individuals in quarantine, mental health professionals.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies."}]}
